  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ApplicationConfig
    Configuration class responsible for configuring application settings related to security and authentication.
    JwtAuthenticationFilter
    JwtAuthenticationFilter is a component responsible for filtering incoming requests to authenticate users using JSON Web Tokens (JWT).
    JwtService
    JwtService is a service class responsible for generating, validating, and extracting information from JSON Web Tokens (JWT).
    SecurityConfig
    SecurityConfig is a configuration class responsible for configuring Spring Security settings.
